description: Joint business base questions - these determine the flow for business partners
note: After these base questions, business base questions are answered, then NIN/TIN is collected for all partners

questions.questionText: How many business partners are involved?
questions.explanation: A joint business filing includes multiple partners or stakeholders. Each partner's share of income and expenses needs to be tracked separately for accurate tax calculations.
questions.helpText: Enter the number of partners or stakeholders in this business.

questions.questionText: How is profit/loss shared among partners?
options: Equal shares (50/50 or equal for all)
questions.explanation: Partnership profit sharing determines how income and expenses are allocated to each partner for tax purposes. Each partner is taxed on their share of the business income.
questions.helpText: Select how profits and losses are divided among the partners.

note_after_base: After these questions, business base questions (BUS_BASE_001 through BUS_BASE_006) will be answered. Then business TIN and each partner's NIN/TIN will be collected before detailed income/expense collection.
